subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Washington Wizards earned their first victory after starting the season with 12 straight losses, getting 19 points from Jordan Crawford in an 84-82 win over the visiting Portland Trail Blazers.
snippet: The Washington Wizards earned their first victory after starting the season with 12 straight losses, getting 19 points from Jordan Crawford in an 84-82 win over the visiting Portland Trail Blazers.
